name: 'Plane Traveller Hexacube' 23.06.2019
description:
The 'Plane Traveller Hexacube' may go down as *the best* isometric invention of mine.

It was a groundbreaking discovery of trial and error.

Like myself, it has an audacious and eccentric personality. It challenges the status quo.

The idea behind it was inspired by our scientific struggle to unite quantum mechanics and general relativity.

In this century, will we finally be able to combine the two theories?

And what would it mean?

Would it allow us to perform useful tasks in collaboration between parallel universes?
